channel.title: How to get betterlooking clicking interface? ALSO other Q's!
channel.description:
Ok so i need help on how to get this new clicking "look" or whatever you call it.
Now it looks like this:
[img]http://img251.imageshack.us/img251/849/clickvanha.jpg[/img]
And i want this :
[img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/521/clickuusi.jpg[/img]
ALL help on this would be great !
Other problems:
1. Ancients are not freezing. Pretty self-explanatory problem.
2. Prayers show as they would be on (in the prayer tab), but they are off. When i click them "off" they turn ON. MAJOR PROBLEM - help needed.
Thanks.
